C

ClackClient - Class in main
The ClackClient class represents the client user.
ClackClient() - Constructor for class main.ClackClient
This ClackClient Default constructor intiializes username to "ANON", hostName to the DEFAULT_HOST value, port to the DEFAULT_PORT value, the closeConnection to false, and the dataToSendToServer and dataToReceiveFromServer to null values
ClackClient(String) - Constructor for class main.ClackClient
This ClackClient constructor initializes userName to a user-provided value.
ClackClient(String, String) - Constructor for class main.ClackClient
This ClackClient constructor initializes the userName and hostName to user-provided values.
ClackClient(String, String, int) - Constructor for class main.ClackClient
This ClackClient constructor initializes the userName, hostName, and port to user-provided values.
ClackData - Class in data
This is an abstract class that all ClackData classes will inherit from.
ClackData() - Constructor for class data.ClackData
This ClackData Default constructor initializes the username to ANON and the type to 0.
ClackData(int) - Constructor for class data.ClackData
This ClackData constructor initializes the username to ANON and the date to the date it is initialized on.
ClackData(String, int) - Constructor for class data.ClackData
This ClackData constructor initializes the username and type to user-provided values and initializes the date to the date it is initialized on.
ClackServer - Class in main
The ClackServer class is a blueprint for a ClackServer object that contains information about the port number that clients connect to, a boolean representing whether the server needs to be closed or not, and ClackData objects representing data sent to and received from the client.
ClackServer() - Constructor for class main.ClackServer
This ClackServer Default constructor initializes port to the DEFAULT_PORT value and initializes dataToReceiveFromClient and dataToSendToClient to null values.
ClackServer(int) - Constructor for class main.ClackServer
This ClackServer constructor initializes port to a user-provided value and initializes dataToReceiveFromClient and dataToSendToClient to null values.
CONSTANT_ALPHABET_LENGTH - Static variable in class data.ClackData
 
CONSTANT_LISTUSERS - Static variable in class data.ClackData
 
CONSTANT_LOGOUT - Static variable in class data.ClackData
give a listing of all users connected to this session
CONSTANT_LOWERCASE_ALPHABET - Static variable in class data.ClackData
send a file
CONSTANT_SENDFILE - Static variable in class data.ClackData
send a message
CONSTANT_SENDMESSAGE - Static variable in class data.ClackData
close this client's connection
CONSTANT_UPPERCASE_ALPHABET - Static variable in class data.ClackData
